beforeProtest.title: RGA Cheatsheet
beforeProtest.text: A quick reference sheet that will help you understand how to comply with the Regulation of Gatherings Act (RGA)

duringProtest.title: Convener’s Checklist
duringProtest.text: A checklist of responsibilities and procedures that the organiser of the protest must see to during the protest.

duringProtest.title: Marshal’s Checklist
duringProtest.text: A checklist of responsibilities and procedures that the marshals at the protest must see to during the protest.

duringProtest.title: Prohibited Conduct
duringProtest.text: A list of prohibited behavior and contraband items that could cause your protest to be shut down.

duringProtest.title: SAPS National Instruction
duringProtest.text: A document containing standing orders for the South African Police Service during gatherings and demonstrations.

afterProtest.title: Your Rights If Arrested or Detained
afterProtest.text: A list of rights that must be upheld by law enforcement if you are arrested or detained.
